about_the_game:
Do you remember Little Sam from Car Dealer Simulator? His son, Lazy Luke, received some unsold cars from his father and a few bucks to start a new business. Unfortunately, the owner lacks the skills to run it. This is your chance to prove your abilities.



Tailor your rental offer to the needs of Wingston Springs residents and visitors. Take care of punctuality, vehicle cleanliness, and positive reviews that will attract new customers.

Be careful, as some orders will require you to modify cars for special occasions.

Also, remember that not all customers return vehicles clean and in good condition, so be prepared for cleaning and minor repairs.

Over time, increase the number and types of cars and other vehicles, invest in promotions, as well as employees and new buildings. A rich offer and a well-maintained company will attract more customers.

Car Rental Simulator is an engaging business simulation with a realistic economic model. It allows you to grow a company, manage a fleet, and interact with customers.

Start your journey in the car rental world and turn Lazy Luke's business into the most magnificent rental service in Wingston Springs.
detailed_description:
Do you remember Little Sam from Car Dealer Simulator? His son, Lazy Luke, received some unsold cars from his father and a few bucks to start a new business. Unfortunately, the owner lacks the skills to run it. This is your chance to prove your abilities.



Tailor your rental offer to the needs of Wingston Springs residents and visitors. Take care of punctuality, vehicle cleanliness, and positive reviews that will attract new customers.

Be careful, as some orders will require you to modify cars for special occasions.

Also, remember that not all customers return vehicles clean and in good condition, so be prepared for cleaning and minor repairs.

Over time, increase the number and types of cars and other vehicles, invest in promotions, as well as employees and new buildings. A rich offer and a well-maintained company will attract more customers.

Car Rental Simulator is an engaging business simulation with a realistic economic model. It allows you to grow a company, manage a fleet, and interact with customers.

Start your journey in the car rental world and turn Lazy Luke's business into the most magnificent rental service in Wingston Springs.
name: Car Rental Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Car Rental Simulator tests your skills in management, marketing, and fulfilling customers' unexpected needs. Grow a small rental company into a true empire in Wingston Springs.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
